cause.description:
Bisexuals, Gays, Lesbians, and Transgender have all been discriminated against in the recent years. Our goal is to put a stop to it. As a teenagers that are Bisexual, Gay, or Lesbian we can make a different
1. Bisexuality is a sexual preference that should be acknowledged
2. Gay and Lesbian rights should be more strictly enforced
cause.mission: make sure that Lesbians, Gays, Transgender, and Bisexuals get the rights they deserve
cause.name: Bisexual, Lesbian, Gay, and Transgender Right
